CustomField.description: For opportunities that qualify under the official Assist program, select the team member that provided the Assist that set up the First Meeting for the Managing Director.

lookupFilter.errorMessage: Managing Directors, PGLs and Product Marketing currently qualify for official Assists outside their territory or practice. Talk to Dan if you are not listed here, but can help.
